FuncDef: This command adds a RADIUS server and configures the RADIUS server IP address, index, and key values.

ParaDef.Info: The index for the RADIUS server. The index determines the sequence in which the servers are queried for authentication requests. Servers are queried in order from lowest to highest index. Values-1 to 10 (a maximum of 5 accounting servers).
Keyword used to create the server index.
